pullrequest.title: Change minibatch to use numpy.random.choice to avoid need to seed two different RNGs

content.raw: I've now managed to recreate the same parse error twice (exact same random window selection) with two separate runs using the same seed now, as we were discussing earlier (this is with the updated code from this pull request) (we were getting different window selections earlier).
content.html: I've now managed to recreate the same parse error twice (exact same random window selection) with two separate runs using the same seed now, as we were discussing earlier (this is with the updated code from this pull request) (we were getting different window selections earlier).
